name: Murder of Crow (HaleyJPEG, SteelChikorita, Teyplays, Silin Song)
name_original: Murder of Crow (HaleyJPEG, SteelChikorita, Teyplays, Silin Song)
description:
A cutesy, somewhat lighthearted mystery game!

Take on the role of Crowley, an over-dramatically serious detective as he investigates the recent harrowing crime which has rattled the critter community. With his trusty magnifying glass, hat, and loyal assistant Kiwi, surely no case is too big for this detective to crack!

Our core gameplay is centred around exploration and investigation. The “hub and spoke” structure and semi-linear narrative affords more freedom and choice in how to approach the mystery.

Controls

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move 
  • M to toggle Murder Board display 
  • Enter/Space to interact 
  • ESC to Pause
